hero.title: Welcome to Jabwood
hero.subtitle: 50+ Years of Excellence in Premium Wood Products

company.title: About Jabwood
company.description: For over 50 years, Jabwood has been a trusted name in the wood industry, providing premium quality hard woods, soft woods, and wood-based panels to customers throughout Lebanon and beyond.
company.description2: Based in Tripoli, Lebanon, we pride ourselves on our commitment to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction. Our extensive product range includes everything from exotic hardwoods to engineered wood panels.

footer.tagline: 50+ years of excellence in premium wood products from Tripoli, Lebanon.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: All our wood products undergo rigorous quality control to ensure they meet the highest standards. We source our materials from trusted suppliers and maintain strict quality standards throughout our supply chain.
quality.qualityControlDesc: Rigorous testing and inspection of all products
quality.sustainableSourcingDesc: Responsibly sourced materials from certified suppliers
quality.expertConsultationDesc: Professional advice for your specific needs

about.title: About Jabwood
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Premium Wood Products
about.storyDesc1: The amazing story of the Jabado family started a long time ago, back in the 1930's, in a small shop of retail wood planks with a yearly sale of 4000 CBM owned by Mr. Mahmoud Jabado near Beirut harbor
about.storyDesc2: And just like the trees, out of which their wood is produced, the family matured to become a highly acclaimed company that both imports and exports the finest wood
about.growthDesc1: From a traditional family lumberyard to a multi-division company
about.growthDesc2: Because for close to half a century we've been a growing concern. From a traditional family lumberyard in Beirut harbor with most customers within a 10 Kms radius, we've become a multi-division company supplying the Middle East market with most of its timber needs
about.growthDesc3: Nowadays, Jabwood carries large-scale timber operations of 400,000 CBM covering all the Middle East territories in a company, which is recognized as one of the leading companies in the Arab World and among the top world timber trading companies World Wide
about.valuesDesc: Yet we still work to build close, long-term relationships with our customers, doing business with the same traditional family values we had when we began. That's probably why, even today, small and large businesses still think of us more as business 'partners', and consultants rather than as a 'conventional' supplier
about.globalOpsDesc: You don't achieve worldwide sales of approximately 400,000 CBM on policy of prices alone. At Jabwood, we have the unique ability to ship global orders immediately, and from an inventory measured in thousands of CBM, which is consisting of virtually every species of timber, and every kind of stratified product requested in the Middle East
about.globalOpsDept: Today, our Jabwood international department has the

branches.title: Our Branches
branches.subtitle: Serving Lebanon, Jordan, and Saudi Arabia
branches.tripoliDesc: Our activity spreads over Lebanon, Jordan and Saudi Arabia where we try our best to give the most exclusive service to our customers. Directly or through our main partners, our follow up starts from the cutting at sawmill to the yard of end users.
branches.tripoliLocation: Our head quarter is located in Tripoli / Lebanon serving our wood imports, transportations and distribution into our home markets.
branches.serviceAreasDesc: We serve customers across multiple countries
branches.lebanonDesc: Our home market with headquarters in Tripoli
branches.saudiArabiaDesc: Expanding our reach across the region
branches.serviceCommitmentDesc: We provide comprehensive service coverage from the initial cutting at the sawmill all the way to delivery at your yard. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction ensures that every step of the process meets our high standards.
branches.qualityControlDesc: Rigorous inspection at every stage of production and delivery
branches.reliableDeliveryDesc: Timely and secure transportation to your location
branches.getInTouchDesc: Ready to discuss your wood requirements? Contact our team for expert advice and competitive pricing.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team
contact.headquartersDesc: Our main office is located in Tripoli, Lebanon, serving our wood imports, transportations and distribution into our home markets:
contact.branchSaudiDesc: Our branch in Saudi Arabia is located in Jeddah and serves the Saudi market with a wide range of wood products.
contact.getInTouchDesc: For inquiries about our products, services, or to discuss your wood requirements, please don't hesitate to contact us. We're here to help with all your timber needs.

footer.tagline: years of excellence in premium wood products from Tripoli, +50 Lebanon

hero.subtitle: Architecture of Nature
hero.title: Timeless
hero.description: Since 1930, crafting premium wood products from Tripoli, Lebanon. Your trusted partner for hardwoods, softwoods, and engineered panels across the Middle East.

intro.title: Crafting legacy from the
intro.description: Since the 1930s, Jabwood has bridged the gap between raw nature and refined architecture. Based in Tripoli, we curate rare hardwoods and sustainable panels for the world's most demanding projects.

catalog.title: Our Catalog
catalog.customOrdersDesc: Need specific dimensions or rare species? Our Tripoli facility handles bespoke requests for large-scale construction.

precision.title: Precision.
precision.description: State-of-the-art machinery meets traditional craftsmanship in our Lebanese facilities.
